[30;1m854 | [0m[35m        # If we just wait for the _watch_received event and the _all_watcher task[0m
[30;1m855 | [0m[35m        # fails (e.g. because API fails like migration is in progress), then[0m
[30;1m856 | [0m[35m        # we'll hang because the _watch_received will never be set[0m
[30;1m857 | [0m[35m        # Instead, we watch for two things, 1) _watch_received, 2) _all_watcher done[0m
[30;1m858 | [0m[35m        # If _all_watcher is done before the _watch_received, then we should see[0m
[30;1m859 | [0m[35m        # (and raise) an exception coming from the _all_watcher[0m
[30;1m860 | [0m[35m        # Otherwise (i.e. _watch_received is set), then we're good to go[0m

[30;1m17 | [0m[35m# This could let us fake the protocol we want[0m
[30;1m18 | [0m[35m# while decoupling the protocol from the RPC and the IO/Process context[0m
[30;1m19 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m20 | [0m[35m# The problem is leaking the runtime impl details to the top levels of the API[0m
[30;1m21 | [0m[35m# with async def By handling the Marshal/Unmarshal side of RPC as a protocol we[0m
[30;1m22 | [0m[35m# can leave the RPC running to a specific delegate without altering the method[0m
[30;1m23 | [0m[35m# signatures.  This still isn't quite right though as async is co-op[0m

[30;1m155 | [0m[35m        # service is up and listening, which creates a race for the ssh command. So we retry a[0m
[30;1m156 | [0m[35m        # couple of times until either we run out of attempts, or the ssh command succeeds to[0m
[30;1m157 | [0m[35m        # mitigate that effect.[0m
[30;1m158 | [0m[35m        # TODO (cderici): refactor the ssh and scp subcommand processing into a single method.[0m

[30;1m113 | [0m[35mtype, which isn't standard JSON and must be parsed slightly differently.[0m
[30;1m114 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m115 | [0m[35mAt the top of that file are two lists, `__all__` and `__patches__`.  The[0m
[30;1m116 | [0m[35mformer replaces entire class implementations, while the latter patches[0m
[30;1m117 | [0m[35mthe attributes of the override classes into the matching generated class,[0m
[30;1m118 | [0m[35mleaving the rest of the generated class untouched.[0m
